heading: Sustainability & Responsibility
description: Partnering with ethical suppliers and advancing responsible practices across our value chain.

items.title: Responsible Sourcing
items.text: Long-term partnerships with suppliers aligned on ethics and quality.

items.title: Efficient Logistics

items.title: Packaging Innovation
items.text: Exploring recyclable, reduced-waste formats without compromising product integrity.
